text: Marin Ljubić (born 18 October 1997) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Hajduk Split in the Croatian First Football League. ==Career== === Hajduk Split === On 29 July 2018, Ljubić made his first team debut coming on as a substitute for Tomislav Duka in a 4-1 defeat against Osijek.Four days later, he got his first start and a European debut in Europa league second round qualifier against Slavia Sofia. Ljubić had a couple of great saves and helped Hajduk reach third qualifying round after a 3-2 win in Sofia. ==References== ==External links== *Marin Ljubić at hajduk.hr * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:HNK Hajduk Split players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Split, Croatia
title: Marin Ljubić
